items.sentence: French was more difficult to learn than I expected.
Please tell Tom I'm going to be a few minutes late.
I've looked everywhere, but I haven't found it yet.
If you don't like that, you don't have to drink it.
I think I should tell Tom we won't do that anymore.
Just promise me you won't do that until I get back.
How dare you tell me what I should or shouldn't do!
Children's laughter could be heard in the distance.
You came here because you wanted to know the truth.
That's not the main reason that Tom had to do that.
